text:
REFILE-UPDATE 2-Swiss bank PKB broke money-laundering rules in Brazilian cases - FINMA John Revill and Michael Shields Published 46 Mins Ago Reuters 
cases - FINMA@ (Refiles fixing typo in 13th paragraph) 
  a criminal investigation into PKB, following disclosures made by the bank, confirming a story that appeared in the online edition of Swiss newspaper Luzerner Zeitung.
